name: Driller (itch) (CRA Games)
description:
Fixed version: https://justaroom.itch.io/driller

Drill down and collect ore for point ore use them to upgrade yourself!

Traverse endless depths and avoid enemies that live in the dark!

Can you make it to floor 1000?

Controls:
A, D - move
S - drill
E - craft
Mouse for Buttons

This game was made for Ludum Lare 48 - Deeper and deeper.
